description: Spaceheat Node. Type for tracking information about a Spaceheat Node.

UuidCanonicalTextual.description: A string of hex words separated by hyphens of length 8-4-4-4-12.

LeftRightDot.description: Lowercase alphanumeric words separated by periods, most significant word (on the left) starting with an alphabet character.

SpaceheatActorClass000.name: sh.actor.class.000
SpaceheatActorClass000.description: Determines the code running Spaceheat Nodes supervised by Spaceheat SCADA software

oneOf.title: NoActor
oneOf.description: A SpaceheatNode that does not have any code running on its behalf within the SCADA, but is instead only a reference object (for example, a tank of hot water or a resistive element) that can be discussed (for example, the power drawn by the resistive element can be measured) or evaluated (for example, a set of 5 different temperatures in different places on the tank can be used to estimate total thermal energy in the tank).

oneOf.title: Scada
oneOf.description: The SCADA actor is the prime piece of code running and supervising other ProActors within the SCADA code. It is also responsible for managing the state of TalkingWith the AtomicTNode, as well maintaining and reporting a boolean state variable that indicates whether it is following dispatch commands from the AtomicTNode XOR following dispatch commands from its own HomeAlone actor.

oneOf.title: HomeAlone
oneOf.description: HomeAlone is an abstract Spaceheat Actor responsible for dispatching the SCADA when it is not talking with the AtomicTNode.

oneOf.title: BooleanActuator
oneOf.description: A SpaceheatNode representing an electric relay, that can be turned off (open circuit) or on (closed circuit).

oneOf.title: PowerMeter
oneOf.description: A SpaceheatNode representing the power meter that is used to settle financial transactions with the TerminalAsset. That is, this is the power meter whose accuracy is certified in the creation of the TerminalAsset GNode via creation of the TaDeed.

oneOf.title: Atn
oneOf.description: A SpaceheatNode representing the AtomicTNode. Note that the code running the AtomicTNode is not local within the SCADA code, except for a stub used for testing purposes.

oneOf.title: SimpleSensor
oneOf.description: A SpaceheatNode representing a sensor that measures a single category of quantity (for example, temperature) for a single object (for example, on a pipe).

oneOf.title: MultipurposeSensor
oneOf.description: A sensor that either reads multiple kinds of readings from the same sensing device (for example reads current and voltage), reads multiple different objects (temperature from two different thermisters) or both.

oneOf.title: Thermostat
oneOf.description: A SpaceheatNode representing a thermostat.

ShNodeRole000.name: sh.node.role.000
ShNodeRole000.description: Categorizes SpaceheatNodes by their function within the heating system

oneOf.title: Unknown
oneOf.description: Unknown Role

oneOf.title: Scada
oneOf.description: Primary SCADA

oneOf.title: HomeAlone
oneOf.description: HomeAlone GNode

oneOf.title: Atn
oneOf.description: AtomicTNode

oneOf.title: PowerMeter
oneOf.description: A SpaceheatNode representing the power meter that is used to settle financial transactions with the TerminalAsset. That is, this is the power meter whose accuracy is certified in the creation of the TerminalAsset GNode via creation of the TaDeed.

oneOf.title: BoostElement
oneOf.description: Resistive element used for providing heat to a thermal store.

oneOf.title: BooleanActuator
oneOf.description: A solid state or mechanical relay with two states (open, closed)

oneOf.title: DedicatedThermalStore
oneOf.description: A dedicated thermal store within a thermal storage heating system - could be one or more water tanks, phase change material, etc.

oneOf.title: TankWaterTempSensor
oneOf.description: A temperature sensor used for measuring temperature inside or on the immediate outside of a water tank.

oneOf.title: PipeTempSensor
oneOf.description: A temperature sensor used for measuring the temperature of a tank. Typically curved metal thermistor with thermal grease for good contact.

oneOf.title: RoomTempSensor
oneOf.description: A temperature sensor used for measuring room temperature, or temp in a heated space more generally.

oneOf.title: OutdoorTempSensor
oneOf.description: A temperature sensor used for measuring outdoor temperature.

oneOf.title: PipeFlowMeter
oneOf.description: A meter that measures flow of liquid through a pipe, in units of VOLUME/TIME

oneOf.title: HeatedSpace
oneOf.description: A Heated Space.

oneOf.title: HydronicPipe
oneOf.description: A pipe carrying techinical water or other fluid (e.g. glycol) in a heating system.

oneOf.title: BaseboardRadiator
oneOf.description: A baseboard radiator - one kind of emitter in a hydronic heating system.

oneOf.title: RadiatorFan
oneOf.description: A fan that can amplify the power out of a radiator.

oneOf.title: CirculatorPump
oneOf.description: Circulator pump for one or more of the hydronic pipe loops

oneOf.title: MultiChannelAnalogTempSensor
oneOf.description: An analog multi channel temperature sensor

oneOf.title: Outdoors
oneOf.description: The outdoors
